column4: how do i change which python interpreter is called.  I have added `/opt/Python-2.6.4/bin` to the front of my PATH, and done a source ~/.profile, but it is still calling the python located at /usr/bin
how do i change which python interpreter is called.  I have added `/opt/Python-2.6.4/bin` to the front of my PATH, and done a source ~/.profile, but it is still calling the python located at /usr/bin
in your  entry point script, you can change the very first line that starts with #!  (the "shebang") to your interpreter of choice
